head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MURPHY, CATHERINE FARRELL

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MURPHY, CATHERINE FARRELL

block.p: MURPHY--Catherine Farrell, of New York, NY, died on Tuesday, January 9, 2007, in Boca Raton, FL, with her beloved husband, Bill, at her side. She was 77. She is survived by her husband, William Debar Murphy, her daughter, Susan Murphy Ferrand, and her son, Anthony Murphy; five grandchildren, Hannah, Matilda, Oliver, Samuel and Aidan; two sisters, Eileen French and Jean Roth, and two brothers, Francis Farrell and Martin Farrell; and scores of beloved nieces, nephews and friends. A memorial service will be held in New York in February.

MURPHY--Catherine Farrell, of New York, NY, died on Tuesday, January 9, 2007, in Boca Raton, FL, with her beloved husband, Bill, at her side. She was 77. She is survived by her husband, William Debar Murphy, her daughter, Susan Murphy Ferrand, and her son, Anthony Murphy; five grandchildren, Hannah, Matilda, Oliver, Samuel and Aidan; two sisters, Eileen French and Jean Roth, and two brothers, Francis Farrell and Martin Farrell; and scores of beloved nieces, nephews and friends. A memorial service will be held in New York in February.
